dependencies: OS packages installed in container: supervisor, gettext-base, nginx, apache2-utils (Dockerfile)
architectural_resources: Containerized web application (MLflow tracking server behind nginx basic auth)
Relational database for MLflow backend store (PostgreSQL via docker-compose; also supports MySQL via pymysql and Postgres via psycopg2)
Object storage for artifacts (S3 implied by boto3 and MLFLOW_ARTIFACT_URI examples in README/app.json)
Container registry for CI publishing (Amazon ECR Public referenced in .github/workflows/build_*.yml)
AWS credentials/region usage in CI (aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials in workflows)
